name: AzureManagedapp
help: Manage template solutions provided and maintained by Independent Software Vendors (ISVs).

properties.name: Kind
properties.help: The managed application kind. can be marketplace or servicecatalog.

properties.name: ManagedRgId
properties.help: The resource group managed by the managed application.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The managed application name.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: The resource group of the managed application.

properties.name: Location
properties.help: The managed application location.

properties.name: ManagedappDefinitionId
properties.help: The full qualified managed application definition id.

properties.name: Parameters
properties.help: JSON formatted string or a path to a file with such content.

properties.name: PlanName
properties.help: The managed application package plan name.

properties.name: PlanProduct
properties.help: The managed application package plan product.

properties.name: PlanPublisher
properties.help: The managed application package plan publisher.

properties.name: PlanVersion
properties.help: The managed application package plan version.

properties.name: Tags
properties.help: Tags in 'a=b c' format.

properties.name: Subscription
properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Ids
properties.help: One or more resource IDs (space-delimited). If provided, no other 'Resource Id' arguments should be specified.

properties.name: Name
properties.help: The name of the managed application.

properties.name: ResourceGroup
properties.help: The resource group of the managed application.

properties.help: Name or ID of subscription. You can configure the default subscription using `az account set -s NAME_OR_ID`.

properties.name: Authorizations
properties.help: Space-separated authorization pairs in a format of <principalId>:<roleDefinitionId>.

properties.name: CreateUiDefinition

properties.name: Location
properties.help: Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=&lt;location&gt;`.

properties.help: The managed application definition main template.

properties.name: PackageFileUri
properties.help: The managed application definition package file uri.
